title: Drawing, Apollo in Chariot with Aurora and the Hours, 1805
title_raw: Apollo in Chariot with Aurora and the Hours
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown watercolor washes over traces of graphite on light brown rough paper
inscribed: Inscribed at top in graphite: Apollo zodiaco l aurora le ore.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Apollo shown riding in chariot drawn by three horses. Aurora and the Hours accompany him. Part of Zodiac shown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Apollo in Chariot with Aurora and the Hours, 1805. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown watercolor washes over traces of graphite on light brown rough paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3310
